name: Saving Grace (Thomas09 Games) (Thomas09 Games)
description:
What would it be like if some masked men took your daughter? What would you do?
Would you meet their demands... Or suffer the loss. The choice is yours.
Undertake this journey to get your daughter back... She's counting on you. Everyone is counting on you.

Hell is real. If you do not stop this catastrophe, everyone you know, everyone you love will be damned.

It rests on your shoulders. Will you bare the weight? or live in eternal pain as hell ascends to earth.

  • Solve puzzles
  • Full Keyboard/Mouse and Controller support
  • Explore Vast sandbox levels
  • Story Driven
  • Uncover the mysteries surrounding your family
  • Use your wits to slay evil with an array of arsenal
  • Uncover the dark truth to why your daughter was chosen
  • Face off against the embodiment of evil and punishment himself... The devil incarnate

    MacOS and Linux builds will be available at a later date.

Saving Grace is a solo indie project and I thank you so much, for taking the time to view my game page! If the game interests you, please consider purchasing
and playing it! It will directly support an individual. The Game has a duration of a couple hours start to finish. However that does not stop you from spending
time playing individual levels and having a blast!

Once again, Thank you SO MUCH for taking the time to view and hopefully purchase! It helps more than you know.

-Thomas Ironmonger, Thomas09 Games.
